basics.name: Henri Casanova
basics.label: Professor
basics.summary: I am a Professor at the University of Hawaii. I am an author of [Parallel Algorithms](https://www.crcpress.com/Parallel-Algorithms/Casanova-Legrand-Robert/p/book/9781584889458), and am currently a PI on the NSF-funded [WRENCH project](https://scitech.isi.edu/2016/09/16/award-nsf-wrench/).

interests.name: network topologies for high performance computing
modeling and simulation of parallell and distributed computing systems
